ISSUE.TITLE: Allow sitemap access even when the public store navigation is closed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 > We setup nopcommerce to generate sitemap.xml, which is working fine. > Our problem is, we removed guest navigation so that viewing every pages requires a login (publicstore - allow navigation). > This has caused nopcommerce to also block sitemap.xml behind login screen, which we don't want. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/90744/sitemapxml-access We already [ignore](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Controllers/CommonController.cs#L285) some action filters when generating a sitemap, let's do it also for the `[CheckAccessPublicStore]`.
